languages.text: "Зря стараетесь, дознаватель. Такой, как она, уже ничто не поможет — она сама не захочет выбираться из этой трясины, сколько бы прутьев вы ей не протянули".
"You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."
languages.original_text: "Зря стараетесь, дознаватель. Такой, как она, уже ничто не поможет — она сама не захочет выбираться из этой трясины, сколько бы прутьев вы ей не протянули".

traits.locale_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."
"You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."
"You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."
"You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

languages.text: “你这是在浪费时间，审讯官，像她这样的人根本就是烂泥扶不上墙。不管你怎么向她伸手，她都不打算从她自己的泥潭里爬出来。”
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

traits.locale_text: “你这是在浪费时间，审讯官，像她这样的人根本就是烂泥扶不上墙。不管你怎么向她伸手，她都不打算从她自己的泥潭里爬出来。”

languages.text: « Vous perdez votre temps, interrogateur. Les gens comme elle sont irrécupérables ; aussi loin que vous étendiez la main, elle n'a visiblement aucun désir de s'extraire du bourbier dans lequel elle s'est enlisée. »
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

traits.locale_text: « Vous perdez votre temps, interrogateur. Les gens comme elle sont irrécupérables ; aussi loin que vous étendiez la main, elle n'a visiblement aucun désir de s'extraire du bourbier dans lequel elle s'est enlisée. »

languages.text: «No pierda el tiempo, Interrogador. No se puede ayudar a alguien como ella. No tiene intención de salir del agujero infecto en el que se ha metido, por mucho que le extienda la mano».
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

traits.locale_text: «No pierda el tiempo, Interrogador. No se puede ayudar a alguien como ella. No tiene intención de salir del agujero infecto en el que se ha metido, por mucho que le extienda la mano».

languages.text: 「時間のムダだ、インテロゲイター。彼女のような人間にはしてやれることはなにもない。彼女は、どんなに手を伸ばそうとも、その泥沼から這い出ることはないだろう」
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

traits.locale_text: 「時間のムダだ、インテロゲイター。彼女のような人間にはしてやれることはなにもない。彼女は、どんなに手を伸ばそうとも、その泥沼から這い出ることはないだろう」

languages.text: "Ihr vergeudet meine Zeit, Interrogator. Ihr könnt für jemanden wie sie nichts tun — sie hat kein Verlangen, sich aus dem Sumpf zu befreien, indem sie sich befindet. Ganz gleich, wie weit Ihr Eure Hand ausstreckt."
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr vergeudet meine Zeit, Interrogator. Ihr könnt für jemanden wie sie nichts tun — sie hat kein Verlangen, sich aus dem Sumpf zu befreien, indem sie sich befindet. Ganz gleich, wie weit Ihr Eure Hand ausstreckt."

languages.text: "Boşa vakit harcıyorsun Sorgucu. Onun gibi biri için ne yapsan nafile. Elini ne kadar uzatırsan uzat, içinde debelendiği bataklıktan kurtulma gibi bir arzusu yok."
languages.original_text: "You are wasting your time, Interrogator. There is nothing you can do for someone like her — she has no desire to crawl out of the mire she's in, no matter how far you may stretch out your hand."

traits.locale_text: "Vaktini boşa harcıyorsun Sorgucu. Onun gibi biri için yapılabilecek hiçbir şey yok. Elini ona ne kadar uzatırsan uzat, içinde bulunduğu bataklıktan kurtulma gibi bir arzusu yok aslında."
